name: Asana Darkness
description: THIS IS THE FINAL UPDATE ON THIS SITE: Stay up to date via GitHub. — Note: I'm an amateur with CSS. This is a work in progress. Dark theme, some sections that I don't use personally are neglected. Take it or leave it .
additional_info: LAST UPDATE ON STYLISH! Move to GitHub! 0.7.7 Fixed dark text in search. 0.7.5 Updated the inbox. 0.7.4 I fixed some fresh white lines appearing in the Project > List view, as well as the bright login screen windows. 0.7.3 Added support for Milestones in List and Board view, courtesy of Alon-e. Also fixed some buttons as well as the new sticker picker popup. 0.7.2 Fixing context menus on task views across the board. Fixed the weird sticker addition, too. 0.7.1 Updating the Inbox section. 0.7.0 Fixed some newly white buttons. 0.6.9 Updated some Team Member settings, some gray text 0.6.8 Keeping up w/ Asana's changes in list view. 0.6.7 Fixed some completed task colors. Minor fixes here and there. Eliminating white. 0.6.6 More updates to inbox and some buttons. 0.6.5 Updates to keep up; fixed the task dropdown menu, project share icon, project icons, etc. 0.6.4 Many updates to the inbox section to keep up. 0.6.3 Small updates to the edit fields task popup. 0.6.2 Updated the progress section. 0.6.1 Updated some items here, very small changes. 0.6.0 Small changes. 0.5.9 Many updates. See github for details. 0.5.8 Long overdue fix for completed tasks in list / search view. 0.5.7 Tidied up pinned comments in task footer. 0.5.6 More fixes 0.5.5 Made some more changes to list view task footer. If you don't care for it... yo 0.5.4 Small changes, but not insignificant. The comments are different in list view. Trying to steer some things back towards the native Asana styles. 0.5.3 Little bits here and there. 0.5.2 Sorry. more changes. 0.5.1 Simple update to profile settings page. 0.5.0 Small change to disabled forms 0.4.9 Fixed that blinding white loading flash. 0.4.8 A bit more that I missed in the last update. 0.4.7 Catching up to Asana's recent changes to list view and search results. Goodbye for now, white. 0.4.6 Fixed something very minor. 0.4.5 Made some much needed adjustments to board view, didn't realize I had some 'legacy' code in there making it monochromatic if tags/custom fields were shown. 0.4.4 Fixed some border and hover color issues in list view. 0.4.3 Playing catch-up with Asana's changes. 0.4.2 Some minor changes to list view. 0.4.1 Made a few changes to conversations, list view; still needs a little work. 0.4.0 Happy holidays! 0.3.9 Asana made a bunch of changes to tasks in spreadsheet view, fixed that up. 0.3.8 Updated search result formatting. v0.3.7 Made a bunch of progress on the Timeline view... still lots of work to be done. v0.3.6 Revamped search results to be more clear, made completed tasks italic, tamed the completed circles a bit. Made the sidebar gray. It's a little cleaner now. v0.3.5 More updates :-D v0.3.4 Got rid of that pesky box-shadow for now v0.3.3 More improvements. v0.3.2 Not sure why, but minifying this code was breaking Stylus. It's back to the beautiful garbage code everyone is used to. v0.3.1 Minified, cleaned up some of the code :gasp: v0.3.0 Added some MORE fixes for Rules v0.2.9 Added some fixes for Rules v0.2.8 Literally changing one line at a time, Asana, please, native dark theme. I can't do this forever. v0.2.7 More updates. v 0.2.6 Asana keeps changing the main task list view... geeze. A daily battle. v0.2.5 Trying to keep up. Various changes. v0.2.4 Small changes. v0.2.3 Made some fixes for the new Rules page v0.2.2 Eliminating the white feels so right. v0.2.1 More slight changes. v0.2.0 Minor tweaks here and there, getting rid of that pesky white. v0.1.9 A few more changes. v0.1.8 Made significant updates to account for the new list view. v0.1.7 I finally changed the comments to show the WYSIWYG editor buttons again. v0.1.6 Playing catchup, made a few fixes with search and other areas. More work to be done. v0.1.5 Made some minor adjustments to deal with Asana's changes. v0.1.4 Adjusted the filter button style. v0.1.3 Fixed the new filter styling. Adjusted Portfolio and calendar settings a bit. Needs more work yet. v0.1.2 More changes. v0.1.1 Improvements all across the board. Be gone, white modals! v0.1.0 Fixed search v0.0.9 Guess what... I UPDATED AGAIN! v0.0.7 UPDATED AGAIN! v0.0.6 Updated to accommodate new Asana layout v0.0.5 Updated to accommodate new Asana layout v0.0.4 Updated to show full width, left and right panes. v0.0.3 Updated to latest style. - TO DO: Timeline v.0.0.2 Task Checkbox Fix • fixed the checkboxes and other minor things - v.0.0.1 Initial Release -

discussions.name: Keep up the great work. This is a lifesaver!
Keep up the great work. This is a lifesaver!
